Package cosc345.AuralLearner.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Callback
    A simple interface for a callback method with no arguments.
    Playable.Delegate
    Delegate provides an interface for objects playing a playable to control what happens when a playable starts and finishes playback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Grader
    The Grader class takes a sequence of notes, gets the user to sing those notes, and gives a grade based on how close what the user's singing was compared to the original sequence of notes.
    Interval
    Represents a musical interval.
    Interval.IntervalName
    Captures both the full name and short name of an musical interval.
    IntervalExerciseGrader  
    Melody
    represents a melody.
    MelodyExerciseGrader  
    MenuAction
    Representation of an action executable from the voice control menu.
    Note
    Represents a musical note.
    PitchDetector
    Listens to microphone input and detects the pitch of the audio.
    PitchMatchingExerciseGrader  
    Playable
    Defines the common methods available to an object that is playable, e.g.
    Scale
    Represents a musical scale.
    ScaleExerciseGrader  
    TextToSpeechManager
    Encapsulate and manage text-to-speech.
    Utilities
    Collection of utility methods.
    VoiceRecognitionManager
    Manages voice recognition and voice control.
    VoiceRecognitionManager.VoiceRecognitionInitialiser
    Initialises the voice recogniser asynchronously.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Difficulty  
    Intervals
    Captures short names of musical intervals.
    Note.NoteLength  
    Scale.ScaleType
    Captures the different types of scales.
    State
    Captures the state of the voice recognition and text-to-speech managers.
